bike.description: Specialized FACT 8r carbon, Az1 construction, compact design, Zertz inserts

components.description: Specialized FACT monocoque carbon fork; full carbon legs, crown and steerer w/ Zertz inserts
Specialized Mindset Plus Carbon, 1 1/8" integrated threadless, cartridge sealed bearings, alloy 20mm cone w/ one 10mm and two 5mm alloy spacers
Specialized Pro-Set lightweight stem, 3D forged alloy, 4-bolt 31.8mm bar clamp, 4- position adjustable
Specialized Zertz Pro, 2014 alloy, Zertz damper, short-reach drop, ergonomic top shaping, 31.8mm
Body Geometry Bar Phat, Soft-Touch cork ribbon w/ 2.5mm gel padding
Shimano Ultegra, 10-speed STI, flight deck compatible
Shimano Ultegra, 10-speed STI, flight deck compatible
FSA MegaExo, integrated exterior cartridge bearings, alloy
Body Geometry Toupé Gel, superlight foam, carbon reinforced base, microfiber cover
Specialized Pro SL, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, 27.2mm
Carbon chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
